metadata.name: HackTool - Quarks PwDump Execution
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the Quarks PwDump tool via commandline arguments

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\quarkspwdump.exe')) OR lower(LOWER(process.cmd_line)) in (' -dhl', ' --dump-hash-local', ' -dhdc', ' --dump-hash-domain-cached', ' --dump-bitlocker', ' -dhd ', ' --dump-hash-domain ', '--ntds-file')))

output.summary: Detects usage of the Quarks PwDump tool via commandline arguments
